menu.prompt: Welcome to Hertzian Harmony! If you want to know the results of the question: "do you think trees on farmland are better than clearing the land before sowing?‚Äù, Please press or say 1. If you want to know the results of the question: "Is it better to preserve historical buildings or replace them with modern infrastructure?", Please press or say 2. If you want to know the results of the question: "Is it more effective to manage forest fires through prevention techniques rather than suppression methods after they start?", Please press or say 3.
